navbar.description: Responsive navigation with logo, links, and hamburger menu

patterns.container: max-w-screen-xl flex flex-wrap items-center justify-between mx-auto p-4
patterns.hamburger_button: inline-flex items-center p-2 w-10 h-10 justify-center text-sm text-gray-500 rounded-lg md:hidden hover:bg-gray-100 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-gray-200 dark:text-gray-400 dark:hover:bg-gray-700 dark:focus:ring-gray-600
patterns.nav_menu: flex flex-col font-medium p-4 md:p-0 mt-4 border border-gray-100 rounded-lg bg-gray-50 md:space-x-8 rtl:space-x-reverse md:flex-row md:mt-0 md:border-0 md:bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 md:dark:bg-gray-900 dark:border-gray-700
patterns.active_link: block py-2 px-3 text-white bg-blue-700 rounded-sm md:bg-transparent md:text-blue-700 md:p-0 dark:text-white md:dark:text-blue-500
patterns.nav_link: block py-2 px-3 text-gray-900 rounded-sm hover:bg-gray-100 md:hover:bg-transparent md:border-0 md:hover:text-blue-700 md:p-0 dark:text-white md:dark:hover:text-blue-500 dark:hover:bg-gray-700 dark:hover:text-white md:dark:hover:bg-transparent
patterns.dropdown_menu: z-10 hidden font-normal bg-white divide-y divide-gray-100 rounded-lg shadow-sm w-44 dark:bg-gray-700 dark:divide-gray-600
patterns.dropdown_item: block px-4 py-2 hover:bg-gray-100 dark:hover:bg-gray-600 dark:hover:text-white
patterns.cta_button: text-white bg-blue-700 hover:bg-blue-800 focus:ring-4 focus:outline-none focus:ring-blue-300 font-medium rounded-lg text-sm px-4 py-2 text-center dark:bg-blue-600 dark:hover:bg-blue-700 dark:focus:ring-blue-800

structure.mega_menu: nav > div.{container} + div.border-y > div.grid > ul > li > a

interactive.hamburger_toggle: data-collapse-toggle="menu-id" on hamburger_button, id="menu-id" on nav_menu wrapper
interactive.dropdown: data-dropdown-toggle="dropdown-id" on button trigger, id="dropdown-id" on dropdown_menu
interactive.user_dropdown: data-dropdown-toggle="user-dropdown" and data-dropdown-placement="bottom" on user button

composition_rules: container wraps all navbar content with max-width and flex layout
hamburger_button uses md:hidden, only visible on mobile
nav_menu hidden by default, toggled via data-collapse-toggle attribute
Use active_link for current page, nav_link for other pages
For sticky behavior add: fixed w-full z-20 top-0 border-b to nav
Dropdown requires data-dropdown-toggle on button and matching id on menu
